private_databases_onboarding_description: You can add additional MySQL Start SQL databases to your hosting plan. Increase the power of your hosting and storage solutions. MySQL databases also provide optimised data management. This solution is ideal for boosting your Personal or Professional hosting plans.
You can also select a private SQL database. You can choose between our various MySQL, MariaDB or PostgreSQL solutions, giving you more freedom to configure your hosting plan.
